body_html:
For CPU, the allocation/free overhead is not an issue because we use tcmalloc internally.

http://goog-perftools.sourceforge.net/doc/tcmalloc.html

There is a discussion on whether we should enable tcmalloc by default for the open-source build. Meanwhile, feel free to try tcmalloc yourself and it should improve things a lot.

body:
For CPU, the allocation/free overhead is not an issue because we use tcmalloc internally. 

http://goog-perftools.sourceforge.net/doc/tcmalloc.html

There is a discussion on whether we should enable tcmalloc by default for the open-source build. Meanwhile, feel free to try tcmalloc yourself and it should improve things a lot.
